Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.controls

Class Summary
AbstractActionContext Abstract class for the Struts context
ActionContext Contains all objects used on the Struts context
BaseAction Abstract action intented to be subclasses by all actions that need a logged user (not LoginAction, for example).
BaseAjaxAction Abstract action to AJAX responses
BaseBindingForm Base classes for forms that use a databinder
BaseCsvAction Base class for CSV export actions
BaseFormAction Action used for common for actions, that handler 3 states: Form preparation: The first request, usually a get2-state case: the first request prepares the form and the second is a form submission
BasePublicAction Base action where there is no logged user expected
BasePublicFormAction Action to be used where no logged user is expected, but a BaseFormAction-like behavior is expected
BaseQueryAction Base action for queries
BaseQueryForm Base form for paged queries
BaseReceiptPrintAjaxAction Base action used to get details for a receipt print
 

Enum Summary
BaseAjaxAction.ContentType An enum with possible content types
